rows.label: tlk70000025_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Ever since you helped out here, the
gossip has been crazy. Everyone's been
talking about you guys.

rows.label: tlk70000025_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I used to think that the best way to
help people was to join the army.

rows.label: tlk70000025_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But now I've seen all you Drivers and
Blades in action, I'm thinking that's
totally groovy too!

rows.label: tlk70000025_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Though I dunno if I really have the
skills to be a Driver...

rows.label: tlk70000025_05_msg0005
rows.name:
But I'm gonna do my best so if I ever
get hold of a Core Crystal, I can be a
leader of the militia like Adel-sama.
